Plot Images:Back Property

Short Name: PlotImages.Back

Requires: Base Development System

Class: WaveformGraph Properties

To Use: Create a property.

Sets the plot area background image, which is behind the grid lines.

This property is useful if you want to insert an image into the background of the graph plot area.

Example

Remarks

The following table lists the characteristics of this property.

Data type
PermissionsRead/Write
Available in Run-Time EngineYes
Available in Real-Time Operating SystemYes
Settable when the VI is runningYes
Loads the front panel into memoryNo
Need to authenticate before useNo
Loads the block diagram into memoryNo
Remote access allowedYes

Example

Refer to the Plot Images Property VI in the labview\examples\Controls and Indicators\Graphs and Charts\Graphs - General directory for an example of using the Plot Images:Back property.
